text: Allah alabat tamra rasulera jan'ya daibadarsanati yathayathabhabe bastabayita karechena. Tomara suniscita pabitra masajide ina-sa allah prabesa karabe nirapattara sathe, tomadera mastaka mundana kaâ€™re o cula kete, tomara bhaya na kaâ€™re. Kintu tini janena ya tomara jana na, sejan'ya e'iti chara'o tini sanghatita karechena eka asanna bijaya.
